sentences.en: A long drum roll introduced the trapeze artists.
sentences.cn: 长长的一阵紧锣密鼓声中迎来了高空秋千表演者。

sentences.en: By the time he was nine years old, he was already performing as a trapeze artist.
sentences.cn: 他年仅九岁时，便已经在表演空中飞人的特技。

sentences.en: Children of the trapeze group win the championship heroically after conquering a number of difficulties.
sentences.cn: 飞人组的孩子们在经历种种麻烦后英雄般地获得冠军.

sentences.en: He also popularized tight pants, the trapeze dress, smocks , thigh - high boots and tuxedo jackets.
sentences.cn: 同时,他普及了紧身裤 、 吊带裙 、 制服装 、 高邦靴以及无尾的夜礼服.

sentences.en: He was a great trapeze artist, but he was completely vain.
sentences.cn: 他秋千确实荡的好, 但他太自负了.

sentences.en: Install trapeze swing onto their swing set.
sentences.cn: 在买给他们的秋千组合上,安装吊架.

sentences.en: Look at the flying trapeze acts.
The trapeze artist's act electrified the audience.
sentences.cn: 空中飞人的动作使观众又紧张又兴奋.

sentences.en: They have magic shows , flying trapeze arts, tightrope walking and even the clowns.
sentences.cn: 他们有魔术 、 空中飞人 、 走钢丝,甚至还有小丑.

sentences.en: Trapeze acrobatics is her favorite performance every time she goes to the circus.
sentences.cn: 每次看马戏表演,她最喜欢的节目是空中飞人.

trans.tran_en: a short bar hanging from two ropes high above the ground, used by  acrobats
